content:
jameysharp commented on issue #5502:

When you get a chance, you should be able to redo this PR more cleanly now since #5482 merged. Please add the riscv64 feature to the cranelift-codegen dependency in fuzz/Cargo.toml at the same time so the icache fuzz target can start testing this target too. That also means you can fuzz the codegen phase of this backend on whichever of your computers is fastest. :tada:
